longTestimonial: Thank you again so much for the information, Jerry. This has been an enlightening experience, and I greatly appreciate the time you’ve spent explaining everything to us. I’ve been forwarding your replies to my family and we are 100% certain that putting this painting in your hands at the Bedford Fine Art Gallery is the best course of action.
name: Allison G.
shortTestimonial: Thank you again so much for the information, Jerry.
